text.main: We use cookies to provide you with a better experience on our website. You can accept all or customize your preferences. For more information, see our

mandatory.title: Essential cookies
mandatory.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled in our systems. They are used to store your privacy preferences, log in to your account, and fill out forms.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: These cookies allow us to collect statistical data about website usage. They help us understand how users navigate the site, enabling continuous improvement. The collected data is anonymous.

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to display advertisements tailored to your interests. They may be used by us or our advertising partners to show personalized ads on other websites.
